title: Faye Fellatio Prequel 01: Halloween

Part 01 (Faye Does Halloween)

"Trick or treat," Faye announced for the fourth time, this time with practically no enthusiasm at all. The moment was long passed. Nevertheless she ventured a gentle wave of her pumpkin, just in case it helped get the message through.

"Oh... right..." Mr Johnson thought for a moment. "I... er... think we have some candy somewhere. Can you hold on a moment?"

Faye risked a quick look about. The street looked empty. "Actually... Mr Johnson, would you mind if I come in for a moment? It's awfully cold out here."

"Well... I... er..." Mr Johnson wanted to say yes so badly. But what would Mrs Johnson say if she found out? She wasn't the easiest of women to live with at the best of times. If she found out that he'd had young Faye in the house...
